message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110.  It's a great deal for you, considering its value to me.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but $110 is a bit out of my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm happy to work with you. How about $95?  It's a fair price, considering the value of the product and my willingness to negotiate.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
